Sentencas: NiO-Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9 (NiO-SDC) nanocomposite powders applied as promising anode material for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) were synthesized by hydroxide co-precipitation method using NH3 center dot H2O, NaOH and NH3 center dot H2O+NaOH as precipitation agents.
Titulo: Co-Precipitation Synthesis and Characterization of NiO-Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9 Nanocomposite Powders: Effect of Precipitation Agents

Sentencas: The crystal phases, morphologies and sintering behavior of the synthesized NiO-SDC nanocomposite powders were investigated by means of X-ray diffraction (XRD), transmission electron microscopy (TEM) and sintering experiments.
Titulo: Co-Precipitation Synthesis and Characterization of NiO-Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9 Nanocomposite Powders: Effect of Precipitation Agents

Sentencas: The effect of precipitation agents on the synthesis of the NiO-SDC nanocomposite powders was discussed.
Titulo: Co-Precipitation Synthesis and Characterization of NiO-Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9 Nanocomposite Powders: Effect of Precipitation Agents

Sentencas: Results show that different precipitation agents influence greatly the synthesis and characteristics of the NiO-SDC nanocomposite powders.
Titulo: Co-Precipitation Synthesis and Characterization of NiO-Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9 Nanocomposite Powders: Effect of Precipitation Agents

Sentencas: The NiO-SDC nanocomposite powders synthesized with NH3 center dot H2O deviate from the original composition due to the loss of Ni.
Titulo: Co-Precipitation Synthesis and Characterization of NiO-Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9 Nanocomposite Powders: Effect of Precipitation Agents

Sentencas: The loss of Ni is avoided and nano-sized NiO-SDC composite powders are synthesized, when NaOH and NH3 center dot H2O+NaOH are used as precipitation agents.
Titulo: Co-Precipitation Synthesis and Characterization of NiO-Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9 Nanocomposite Powders: Effect of Precipitation Agents

Sentencas: The NiO-SDC nanocomposite powders can be synthesized at relatively low temperature using NH3 center dot H2O+NaOH as precipitation agent, and the synthesized NiO-SDC nanocomposite powders show good sintering characteristics.
Titulo: Co-Precipitation Synthesis and Characterization of NiO-Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9 Nanocomposite Powders: Effect of Precipitation Agents
